channel.description: Recent content in Shane on Rick Wysocki

item.title: Masculinity in Shane and Yojimbo
item.description: I’ve been going through some of my notes from a film genre class I took in graduate school. One week, we watched Shane and Yojimbo as cross-cultural examples of the western, which historically commingled with the samurai film in Japan.
